title: Eric Sprott: See you in the news pages
content:
Home » Columns , Local Sports , Opinion , Scroll Feature Submitted by rtinsley on September 29, 2015  12:15 am    I think it’s a pretty fair assumption that everyone who gets into this business keeps a mental list for what to say when they inevitably sit down to say goodbye to their readers.
